stat.description: Race

stat.name: Background
stat.description: Background

stat.name: Profession
stat.description: Profession

stat.name: Power
stat.description: Determines the potency of all of your combat abilities. Increases damage and healing values of all abilities

stat.name: Speed
stat.description: How quickly you can move and perform actions. Increases speed of movement, and speed of actions in combat

stat.name: Vitality
stat.description: Your health and constitution. Determines your base hitpoints and resistance to physical attacks

stat.name: Willpower
stat.description: Essence resilience. Determines your base Power Points and resistance to Essence attacks

stat.name: Essence
stat.description: Attunement with the Essence. Increased values allows for more Essence Infusions without penalty, and master more complex Essence Techniques

stat.name: Technomancy
stat.description: Capacity for technological implants and upgrades. Increased values allows more Cybernetics and more complex systems to be installed

stat.name: Biogenetics
stat.description: Genetic plasticity. Increased values allow more DNA Enhancements and different Genemoulds to be utilized

stat.name: Charisma
stat.description: Charm and wit. Affects prices in shops, disposition with NPCs and loyalty of comrades

stat.name: Luck
stat.description: Sheer fortune and a knack for suceeding against the odds. Has a small affect on all actions, improves chances of finding items and increases critical chance

stat.name: Close quarters combat
stat.description: Overall martial ability in close range, ability to land hits, deflect oncoming blows and avoid damage altogether

stat.name: Athletics
stat.description: Stamina and bodily health, how long you can perform strenuous physical tasks or stave off detrimental effects such as inhospitable weather, starvation and thirst

stat.name: Marksmanship
stat.description: Accuracy with long-ranged weaponry

stat.name: Perception
stat.description: Attentiveness to detail, awareness of the environment

stat.name: Main Hand Damage
stat.description: Damage done by your main hand weapon

stat.name: Off-hand Damage
stat.description: Damage done by your off-hand weapon

stat.name: Physical Resist
stat.description: Reduces damage from physical sources and assists in resisting physical effects

stat.name: Essence Resist
stat.description: Reduces damage from Essence attacks and helps to prevent harmful Essence effects

stat.name: Main Hand Speed
stat.description: How quickly you perform attacks with your main-hand weapon

stat.name: Off-hand Speed
stat.description: How quickly you perform attacks with your off-hand weapon

stat.name: Ground Speed
stat.description: Base energy cost to move one space

stat.name: Health
stat.description: How much raw damage you can take before passing out
